title: TCPDF is not installed
name: Drupal-7:acquiaTCPDFDisabled
description: Create a symlink to your private files area.
remediation: Disable the TCPDF module: `drush pm-uninstall tcpdf -y`.
success: The TCPDF module is not currently enabled.
failure: The TCPDF module is currently enabled.

module.description: The name of the module to ensure is not installed.
